item.title: Of tombs and skeletons
item.description: This week I relocated from working at the temple on the mountaintop to the tomb in the valley. It’s my official transition to the second and last part of my adventure as an archaeologist this summer. Having been here for three of the six weeks meant it was time to rotate crews and excavation sites, so I am now working under a different site director in a very different place.
